title: ‘Social enterprises backed by social finance, tech are key to stimulate economy at the bottom of the pyramid’ - The Financial Express
content: ‘Social enterprises backed by social finance, tech are key to stimulate economy at the bottom of the pyramid’  The Financial Express
description: Ease of Doing Business for MSMEs: Small businesses led by women and youth and ‘ecopreneurs’ can play the crucial role of change agents in fostering sustainable economic development and building resilience among disadvantaged communities.
